Title: 1. Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
description: After rescuing Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebel Alliance attempts to destroy the second Death Star while Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side.

Title: 2. Terms of Endearment
description: Widow Aurora Greenway juggles her own struggles with a new romantic interest while trying to sort out the emotional problems of her daughter who's married to a philandering husband.

Title: 3. Flashdance
description: An 18-year-old female amateur dancer who performs nightly at a dancing bar, and works as a welder during the day, dreams of joining the Pittsburgh ballet school.

Title: 4. Trading Places
description: A snobbish investor and a wily street con artist find their positions reversed as part of a bet by two callous millionaires.

Title: 5. WarGames
description: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.

Title: 6. Octopussy
description: A fake Fabergé egg recovered from the body of a fellow agent leads James Bond to uncover a jewel smuggling operation led by the mysterious Octopussy, and a plot to blow up a NATO air base.

Title: 7. Sudden Impact
description: When a woman exacts deadly revenge on the aggressors who raped her and her sister ten years earlier, Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan is assigned to the case.

Title: 8. Staying Alive
description: Five years later, Tony Manero's Saturday Night Fever is still burning. Now he's strutting toward his biggest challenge yet: succeeding as a dancer on the Broadway stage.

Title: 9. Mr. Mom
description: After he's suddenly laid off, a husband switches roles with his wife. She returns to the workforce, and he becomes a stay-at-home dad, and he has to take care of three young children, a job he has no clue how to do.

Title: 10. Risky Business
description: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

Title: 11. National Lampoon's Vacation
description: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.

Title: 12. Superman III
description: Entrepreneur Ross Webster teams up with a computer genius in order to realise his own evil intentions. When Superman obstructs his plans, he decides to destroy him.

Title: 13. The Big Chill
description: A group of seven former college friends gather for a weekend reunion at a South Carolina vacation home after the funeral of another of their college friends.

Title: 14. Never Say Never Again
description: James Bond is called upon to try to recover nuclear bombs stolen by Spectre, but he will have to get rid of a professional assassin, hired especially to eliminate him.

Title: 15. Scarface
description: In the 1980s, a determined criminal-minded Cuban immigrant becomes the biggest drug smuggler in Miami, and is eventually undone by his own drug addiction.

Title: 16. Jaws 3-D
description: A giant thirty-five-foot shark becomes trapped in a SeaWorld theme park and it's up to the sons of police chief Brody to rescue everyone.

Title: 17. Blue Thunder
description: The cop test pilot for an experimental police helicopter learns the sinister implications of the new vehicle.

Title: 18. Yentl
description: A Jewish girl disguises herself as a boy to enter religious training.

Title: 19. Silkwood
description: A worker at a plutonium processing plant is purposefully contaminated, psychologically tortured and possibly murdered to prevent her from exposing worker safety violations at the plant.

Title: 20. Psycho II
description: After twenty-two years of psychiatric care, Norman Bates attempts to return to a life of solitude, but the specters of his crimes - and his mother - continue to haunt him.

Title: 21. Porky's II: The Next Day
description: The naughty high schoolers of Angel Beach High now seek revenge on a group of KKK religious fanatics and corrupt politicians who want to shut down their Shakespeare production after they cast a Seminole transfer student in the lead.

Title: 22. Uncommon Valor
description: Ten years after his son went M.I.A. in Vietnam, U.S. Marine retired Colonel Jason Rhodes assembles a private rescue team to find Americans held in P.O.W. camps in Laos.

Title: 23. Never Cry Wolf
description: A government researcher, sent to research the "menace" of wolves in the north, learns about the true beneficial and positive nature of the species.

Title: 24. Twilight Zone: The Movie
description: Four horror and science fiction segments, directed by four famous directors, each of them being a new version of a classic story from Rod Serling's landmark television series.

Title: 25. Easy Money
description: To inherit his mother-in-law's colossal fortune, a hard-living gambling addict must change his unhealthy ways before they get the best of him.

Title: 26. High Road to China
description: Just after WW1, alcoholic American biplane pilot Patrick O'Malley is hired by Eve Tozer, the spoiled daughter of an industrialist, to locate her father, who disappeared somewhere in Asia.

Title: 27. The Outsiders
description: In a small Oklahoma town in 1964, the rivalry between two gangs, the poor Greasers and the rich Socs, heats up when one gang member accidentally kills a member of the other.

Title: 28. Spring Break
description: Two sets of two college guys spend a spring break together in Fort Lauderdale, Florida. There they have lots of fun in and out of the sun.

Title: 29. Two of a Kind
description: When God decides to destroy Earth, four angels aim to redeem mankind through a young man and woman with their own troubles.

Title: 30. My Tutor
description: A rich father hires a tutor for his son. The son is a horny teenager and the tutor is a gorgeous blonde. Complications ensue.

Title: 31. Class
description: A young man in private school spends one crazy night out, and only later does he learn more about the woman who enlivened his night.

Title: 32. The Right Stuff
description: The U.S. space program's development from the breaking of the sound barrier to selection of the Mercury 7 astronauts, from a group of test pilots with a more seat-of-the-pants approach than the program's more cautious engineers preferred.

Title: 33. Cujo
description: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

Title: 34. Christine
description: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.

Title: 35. A Christmas Story
description: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie Parker attempts to convince his parents, teacher, and Santa Claus that a Red Ryder Range 200 Shot BB gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

Title: 36. The Dead Zone
description: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability to foresee future events.

Title: 37. Hot Dog... The Movie
description: Harkin Banks heads to skiing championships in California. A teen runaway tags along as he parties and competes with friends and foes.

Title: 38. Breathless
description: When Jesse Lujack steals a car in Las Vegas and drives down to LA, his criminal ways only escalate - but when will it end?

Title: 39. Max Dugan Returns
description: Struggling single mother Nora McPhee's life is disrupted when her long-lost father Max Dugan returns in hopes of spending some time with her and her son Michael to make up for lost time because Max is dying.

Title: 40. Angel
description: High-schooler Molly secretly earns her living as Angel, a street prostitute whose only family and friends are the ones she works with on the streets. She must survive against a serial killer who is targeting people of her profession.

Title: 41. Valley Girl
description: Julie, a girl from the valley, meets Randy, a punk from the city. They are from different worlds and find love. Somehow they need to stay together in spite of her trendy, shallow friends.

Title: 42. All the Right Moves
description: An ambitious young football star is trapped in a dying mill town--unless his gridiron skills can win him a way out.

Title: 43. Krull
description: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet, Krull.

Title: 44. Spacehunter: Adventures in the Forbidden Zone
description: On a distant planet inhabited by mutants, two bounty-hunters race to rescue three Earth female captives from the clutches of an evil mutant warlord.

Title: 45. D.C. Cab
description: The misadventures of a group of unfortunate but streetwise cabbies working for a Washington, D.C., decrepit taxicab company.

Title: 46. Gorky Park
description: A Moscow police officer investigates a vicious triple homicide and stumbles upon a high-level international political conspiracy.

Title: 47. Still Smokin
description: Cheech and Chong fly to the marijuana capital of the world, Amsterdam, for a film festival where they take Dolly Parton and Burt Reynolds' place in a limo, suite, press conference and performance. They throw in some sketches as well.

Title: 48. Monty Python's the Meaning of Life
description: The comedy team takes a look at life in all of its stages in their own uniquely silly way.

Title: 49. Educating Rita
description: An alcoholic professor has been hired by a working-class girl for higher education.

Title: 50. Private School
description: Chris from a girls' boarding school loves Jim from a nearby boys' boarding school. Jordan also wants Jim and plays dirty. Jim and two friends visit the girls' school posing as girls.

Title: 51. The Survivors
description: Having both lost their jobs, two strangers become unlikely friends after a run in with a would be robber, who is actually a hitman with a grudge against the two.

Title: 52. Revenge of the Ninja
description: After ninjas killed his family, Cho and his son Kane come to America to start a new life. He opens a doll shop but is unwittingly importing heroin in the dolls. When his friend betrays him, Cho must prepare for the ultimate battle.

Title: 53. To Be or Not to Be
description: At the onset of WW2, a Polish actor's family and the Polish Resistance help the troupe of a theatre escape Poland and the invading Nazis.

Title: 54. Stroker Ace
description: The title character, a popular NASCAR driver, clashes with the fried-chicken mogul that sponsors his racing team.

Title: 55. Lone Wolf McQuade
description: After helping the local police with some horse thieves, a Texas Ranger aims at a drug lord with arms trade as well. They're interested in the same woman and they're both into martial arts.

Title: 56. The Black Stallion Returns
description: A teenager loses his horse in Morocco and gets him back after various daredevil adventures.

Title: 57. Deathstalker
description: A lone warrior nicknamed Deathstalker is sent by a witch on a quest to find a sword, a chalice, and an amulet, two of which are held by the wicked king and sorcerer, Munkar.

Title: 58. Zelig
description: "Documentary" about a man who can look and act like whoever he's around, and meets various famous people.

Title: 59. The Lords of Discipline
description: In 1960s America, a black cadet is allowed acceptance into a seemingly prestigious military academy, unleashing a barrage of corruption within the system that another cadet is willing to expose.

Title: 60. The Man Who Loved Women
description: A womanizing sculptor named David goes to seek help from a psychiatrist, Marianna, to cure him of his obsession with women.

Title: 61. Hercules
description: The story of the Greek mythological figure Hercules, battling the wizard King Minos, who uses "science" in an attempt to take over the world. Hercules must stop him and rescue his princess love in the process.

Title: 62. Doctor Detroit
description: A pimp on the run trusts his prostitutes to a meek professor of literature, who accepts the challenge.

Title: 63. Deal of the Century
description: Small-time arms dealer Eddie Muntz visits South America to sell weapons to the revolutionaries and winds up negotiating the sale of an experimental plane to the nation's dictator.

Title: 64. The Man with Two Brains
description: A brain surgeon marries a femme fatale whose life he saved, causing his life to turn upside down. Things go even more awry when he falls in love with a telepathic brain.

Title: 65. Brainstorm
description: Researchers develop a system where they can jump into people's minds. But when people involved bring their personal problems into the equation, it becomes dangerous - perhaps deadly.

Title: 66. Lovesick
description: A psychiatrist, who falls in love with a patient, is visited by the spirit of Sigmund Freud, who gives him advice on how to handle it.

Title: 67. Without a Trace
description: Estranged New Yorker (Kate Nelligan) turns to the police after her son disappears.

Title: 68. Bad Boys
description: Chicago crime kid, Mick O'Brien, is sent to reform school after accidentally killing a rival's kid brother.

Title: 69. Strange Brew
description: Canada's most famous hosers, Bob and Doug McKenzie, get jobs at the Elsinore Brewery, only to learn that something is rotten with the state of it.

Title: 70. Tender Mercies
description: A broken-down, middle-aged country singer gets a new wife, reaches out to his long-lost daughter, and tries to put his troubled life back together.

Title: 71. Something Wicked This Way Comes
description: In a small American town, a diabolical circus and its demonic proprietor prey on the townsfolk.

Title: 72. 10 to Midnight
description: An LAPD detective and his rookie partner are on the trail of a psychopathic young man who is murdering young women.

Title: 73. Romantic Comedy
description: A successful playwright employs a new female writing partner, and it's love on first sight, but it happens to be the day he gets married. They both suppress their feelings for each other in order to form a successful writing partnership.

Title: 74. Nightmares
description: Anthology of four horror tales with a supernatural twist based on urban legends.

Title: 75. The Golden Seal
description: A lonely 10-year-old boy living with his parents in a remote coastal part of Alaska, spontaneously finds a legendary golden seal and her newborn pup. But the greed for her valuable pelt sets off the hunters, including his own father, the local natives, and an ambitious poacher in pursuit the seal. The golden seal and her cub are hunted for a huge bounty on her head and the mythological legend.

Title: 76. The Osterman Weekend
description: During the Cold War, a controversial television journalist is asked by the C.I.A. to persuade certain acquaintances, who are Soviet Agents of the Omega network, to defect.

Title: 77. Star 80
description: A successful young model finds trouble when her obsessive manager-turned-husband becomes dangerously jealous.

Title: 78. The Sting II
description: A team of cons is planning a new scam involving betting on a boxing match but one of its past victims aims to exact revenge by eliminating the whole group.

Title: 79. Amityville 3-D
description: Inquisitive Reveal Magazine journalist John Baxter moves into the Amityville house in defiance of the supernatural events connected to it and finds everyone around him besieged by evil manifestations connected to a demonic presence.

Title: 80. Chained Heat
description: Young Carol Henderson ends up in prison, where she must learn how to survive in an environment plagued by violence, murder, rape, racism, drugs, and staff corruption and brutality.

Title: 81. Beyond the Limit
description: During the Dirty War, a half-English doctor in Argentina befriends the police, the rebels and the alcoholic Honorary British Consul, whose Latino wife he seduces. When the consul is mistakenly kidnapped by the rebels, he must pick a side.

Title: 82. The Hunger
description: A love triangle develops between a vampire, her cellist companion, and a gerontologist.

Title: 83. Local Hero
description: An American oil company has plans for a new refinery and sends someone to Scotland to buy up an entire village, but things don't go as expected.

Title: 84. Under Fire
description: Three journalists in a romantic triangle are involved in political intrigue during the last days of the corrupt Somoza regime in Nicaragua before it falls to a popular revolution in 1979.

Title: 85. Smokey and the Bandit Part 3
description: Big and Little Enos are opening a sea food restaurant. They bet Sheriff Buford T. Justice that he cannot drive from Miami to the Enos ranch in Texas in a given amount of time. If Buford loses he has to give up his badge.

Title: 86. A Night in Heaven
description: A married college professor begins a torrid affair with her failing student, who secretly moonlights as a late-night strip-club dancer.

Title: 87. The Star Chamber
description: Frustrated with a legal system gone haywire, a secret society of judges hires hitmen to snuff out criminals who escape courtroom justice - but one young judge questions the ethics of their vigilante system.

Title: 88. The Dresser
description: Personal assistant Norman struggles to get deteriorating veteran actor Sir through a difficult performance of King Lear.

Title: 89. Metalstorm: The Destruction of Jared-Syn
description: On a desert planet, warlord Jared-Syn is trying to convince a tribe of mutants that he's their messiah and gain unlimited power hidden in a crystal. Ranger Dogen and explorer Dhyana, who's father was murdered by Syn, must stop him.

Title: 90. Love Letters
description: A story of love and obsession. A young radio personality who, after her mother dies, discovers she had been having a love affair for 15 years. Now she finds herself recreating her mother's romance by getting involved with a married man.

Title: 91. Eddie and the Cruisers
description: A television newswoman picks up the story of a 1960s rock band whose long-lost leader Eddie Wilson may still be alive, while searching for the missing tapes of the band's never-released album.

Title: 92. Curse of the Pink Panther
description: Ensuing after the events of Clouseau's disappearance, his bosses at the Surete put a computer into service to elect a new shrewd detective, Sleigh, who turns up just as inept as Clouseau.

Title: 93. Trenchcoat
description: An aspiring mystery writer becomes accidently embroiled in an international plot during a two-week stay in Malta.

Title: 94. Yellowbeard
description: After serving two decades in prison, Yellowbeard (Graham Chapman) breaks out determined to recover the treasure that he buried so long ago, alongside his son, old crew, and the British Navy.

Title: 95. The Keep
description: Nazis are forced to turn to a Jewish historian for help in battling the ancient demon they have inadvertently freed from its prison.

Title: 96. Entre Nous
description: A Jewish refugee marries a soldier to escape deportation to Germany. Meanwhile a wealthy art student loses her first husband to a stray Resistance bullet; at the Liberation she meets an actor, gets pregnant, and marries him.

Title: 97. Joysticks
description: When a top local businessman and his two bumbling nephews try to shut down the town's only video arcade, which is run by the owner's grandson, the arcade employees and patrons fight back.

Title: 98. Running Brave
description: The story of Billy Mills, the American Indian who came from obscurity to win the 10,000-meter long-distance foot-race in the Tokyo Olympics in 1964.

Title: 99. Careful, He Might Hear You
description: His mother dead, PS lives in Sydney with working-class Aunt Lila and Uncle George. When he's six or eight, his posh Aunt Vanessa descends from England. Named a co-guardian by PS's feckless, absent father, she asserts her rights and convinces Lila to have PS live with her weekdays. PS is happy at Lila's, playing with children, running about, speaking up. At Vanessa's, there's a regimen of private school, round vowels, piano and riding lessons, and lonely indoor play with fancy toys. He's miserable and when he objects, she sues for complete custody. Will anyone listen to him? And will he take on Vanessa's challenges to find out who he is and to love someone?

Title: 100. Phar Lap
description: The true story of a New Zealand racehorse that became a champion, with the help of a local stable-boy.

Title: 101. Yor: The Hunter from the Future
description: A warrior seeks his true origins in a seemingly prehistoric wasteland.

Title: 102. Rumble Fish
description: Absent-minded street thug Rusty James struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days of gang warfare.

Title: 103. The Man Who Wasn't There
description: On his wedding day, a State Department employee is given an egg-shaped device by a dying man with blue vials inside, which can turn people invisible. He finds himself being chased by various parties who want the substance.

Title: 104. Table for Five
description: J.P. Tannen takes his three children for a vacation cruise. They usually live with their mother and stepfather, but now J.P. feels capable of taking them. Emotional tragedy strikes, causing battles parent against parent, and parent against child. J.P. tries to show his children that he loves them.

Title: 105. Tough Enough
description: A C and W singer has a family to support so he boxes at a TOUGHMAN amateur boxing contest, hoping to win $5000 and maybe go on to the nationals and sing on national TV.

Title: 106. Man, Woman and Child
description: A man with a wife and two daughters learns that he has a son. It seems that a few years ago while visiting France, he had an accident and he had an affair with the doctor who treated him. Now he has learned that she just died and is informed of his son. He then tells his wife, she then suggest that they bring him over. While there all sorts of tension begin to arise. How will this affect them?

Title: 107. Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence
description: During WWII, a British colonel tries to bridge the cultural divides between a British POW and the Japanese camp commander in order to avoid bloodshed.

Title: 108. Videodrome
description: A programmer at a Toronto TV station that specializes in adult entertainment searches for the producers of a dangerous and bizarre broadcast.

Title: 109. Screwballs
description: Frolicking youth comedy about zany high school students set in the 1960s.

Title: 110. Testament
description: The life of a suburban American family is scarred after a nuclear attack.

Title: 111. Nate and Hayes
description: A swashbuckling adventure which takes place in the mid-1800's on the South Pacific islands where bloody raids and battles were once the rule of the day.

Title: 112. Baby It's You
description: In a 1966 New Jersey high school, Jill and new student Sheik from the other side of the tracks make their way in a first love romance.

Title: 113. Exposed
description: Wisconsin farm girl Elizabeth Carlson leaves her family and her English-teacher lover behind, and escapes to New York City, where she soon makes a career for herself as a fashion model. During a private viewing of paintings, she is approached by a mysterious man whose motives are not clear.

Title: 114. Heat and Dust
description: Anne is investigating the life of her grand-aunt Olivia, whose destiny has always been shrouded with scandal. As Anne delves into the history of her grand-aunt, she is led to reconsider her own life.

Title: 115. Stryker
description: The world's water supply has dried up due to some sort of apocalypse. A beautiful woman holds the secret to where one of the last springs being guarded by a group of Amazons. A "Road Warrior" like crew captures her and tries to make her talk through brutal torture. The hero (Styrker) unites with some of the remaining "good guys" and the Amazons and frees the woman. They go on to a "Road Warrior" type of concluding battle with the bad guys.

Title: 116. Get Crazy
description: Colin Beverly plans to sabotage the New Year's 1983 concert of small-time operator Max Wolfe. Wolfe's assistants Neil Allen and Willie Loman find romance while trying to save the drugs, violence, and rock and roll from Beverly's schemes.

Title: 117. Lianna
description: A happily married woman comes to realize herself of being a repressed lesbian after she has an affair with a female college professor, and then tries to come to terms with her newfound lifestyle.

Title: 118. Sahara
description: Intent on winning a competition in place of her distinguished late father, beautiful young heiress Dale takes on the guise of a man and competes in his spot, embarking on a car race that crosses the unforgiving Sahara desert.

Title: 119. Strange Invaders
description: Alien beings, who settle in a small midwestern town, are disturbed by a young professor determined to rescue his daughter from their clutches.

Title: 120. Gabriela
description: Gabriela becomes cook and mistress to Nacib, a bar owner in a small Brazilian coastal town controlled by local colonels, before eventually marrying him; based on Jorge Amado's novel.

Title: 121. Eddie Macon's Run
description: A young man, harshly sentenced for a few minor infractions, escapes from a prison in Huntsville Texas and flees to Laredo, Texas, where he hopes to cross into Mexico for a reunion with his wife and small son.

Title: 122. The Lonely Lady
description: Hoping to achieve success in Hollywood, a young aspiring screenwriter allows others to exploit her. She goes through affair after sordid affair in her attempt to write her own screenplay and have it produced.

Title: 123. Of Unknown Origin
description: A man becomes destructively obsessed with killing a dangerous rat, which has taken residence in his recently renovated house.

Title: 124. Getting It On
description: An ordinary sex-starved teenager and his friends start secretly video recording high school girls and their activity irks the community, as well as their principal.

Title: 125. Fire and Ice
description: At the end of the ice age, an evil queen and her son are set on conquering the world using magic and warriors. The lone survivor of a crushed village fights back as does the king of Fire Keep.

Title: 126. The Wicked Lady
description: A noblewoman grows restless with her privileged life and secretly takes to robbing travelers. She partners with a dashing highwayman, but her dangerous double life threatens to expose her true identity.

Title: 127. The Pirates of Penzance
description: After a young man leaves a band of pirates, hilarity ensues.

Title: 128. Daniel
description: Daniel Isaacson attempts to determine the true complicity of his parents Paul and Rochelle Isaacson, who were executed for espionage in the 1950s.

Title: 129. Streamers
description: Four young soldiers waiting to be shipped to Viet Nam deal with racial tension and their own intolerance when one soldier reveals he's gay.

Title: 130. Nostalghia
description: A Russian poet and his interpreter travel to Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer, and instead meet a ruminative madman who tells the poet how the world may be saved.

Title: 131. Heart Like a Wheel
description: Shirley Muldowney is determined to be a top-fuel drag racer, although no woman has ever raced them before. Despite the high risks of this kind of racing and the burden it places on her family life, she perseveres in her dream.

Title: 132. Eureka
description: In 1925, a lone and obsessed Arctic prospector Jack McCann finally strikes gold. Twenty years later, he begins spiraling out of control when his only daughter becomes engaged to a man he strongly dislikes.

Title: 133. Slayground
description: Thieves run over a child while escaping after a robbery. A deadly hitman who likes to taunt his targets is hired to track them down. Stone moves to England, but the assassin follows. Loosely based on Donald Westlake's cult crime novel.

Title: 134. Sans Soleil
description: A woman narrates the contemplative writings of a seasoned world traveler, focusing on contemporary Japan.

Title: 135. Rock & Rule
description: A malevolent rock star kidnaps a singer to force her to participate in the summoning of a demon, and her band must help her stop him.

Title: 136. El Norte
description: After their family is killed in a government massacre, siblings Enrique and Rosa flee Guatemala and embark on a perilous journey to "El Norte": the United States.

Title: 137. My Brother's Wedding
description: A man who has struggled personally has conflicts with his upwardly mobile lawyer brother and his brother's well to-do fiancée and is reluctant to be the best man at their wedding.

Title: 138. Summerspell
description: Family celebrations and tensions, Independence Day, Texas 1948

Title: 139. Confidentially Yours
description: After he's implicated in several murders, a real estate agent hides out from the cops while his intrepid secretary does some private investigating of her own to locate the killer.

Title: 140. Sleepaway Camp
description: Bunks and showers are a mad stabber's beat at a summer camp strictly for teens.

Title: 141. Cries of Pleasure
description: A married man invites a woman to his house to live with him, just before the arrival of his wife, who is coming back from a mental asylum.

Title: 142. The Key
description: 1940s Venice. After twenty years of marriage, a retired art critic and his younger wife feel their passion is waning. To help her shed her inhibitions and rekindle their relationship, the professor records his sexual fantasies in a diary.

Title: 143. Angst
description: A troubled man gets released from prison and starts taking out his sadistic fantasies on an unsuspecting family living in a secluded house.

Title: 144. First Desires
description: Three teenage girls decide to visit a romantic island and find love. They get shipwrecked and end up on different sides of the island. Each girl begins her own romantic adventure either with a man, a boy or even another girl.

Title: 145. BMX Bandits
description: A trio of teen BMX enthusiasts become entangled with a group of bank robbers after discovering their cache of walkie-talkies.

Title: 146. Zappa
description: In the early '60s, 3 Danish classmates join a "den"/tree house. Steen likes his pet fish Zappa because it eats the weaker fish. Bjørn attracts girls and Mulle is a talkative, strong boy. Steen gets them into burglary and later escalates.

Title: 147. Nana
description: A beautiful and willful prostitute puts her appearance and body to use to become the toast of the town.

Title: 148. Suburbia
description: When household tensions and a sense of worthlessness overcome Evan, he finds escape when he clings with the orphans of a throw-away society.

Title: 149. Curtains
description: Six young actresses auditioning for a movie role at a remote mansion are targeted by a mysterious masked murderer.

Title: 150. Extra Terrestrial Visitors
description: A young boy in the woods discovers a lovable alien...or is it?

Title: 151. Fanny Hill
description: Frances is a naive young woman who arrives in London from the countryside. There she works in a brothel. Her charm and beauty make her highly coveted, but she falls in love with Charles, who loves her not only for her body.

Title: 152. Sweet Sixteen
description: Teenager Melissa moves into a small town filled with racial prejudice and bullying, and each time she meets up with one of the boys in town, they end up murdered - but who is the killer?

Title: 153. Pauline at the Beach
description: Marion is about to divorce from her husband and takes her 15-year-old niece Pauline on a vacation to Granville. She meets an old love...

Title: 154. American Taboo
description: Unstable thirty-something introvert, who works as a photographer's assistant, becomes obsessed with his underage female neighbor, who, to his horror, reciprocates his feelings due to possible Electra complex.

Title: 155. The First Turn-On!!
description: A group of teenage summer campers and one counselor share the stories of their first sexual experiences when a rock slide traps them in a cave.

Title: 156. The Final Terror
description: A group of rangers go camping on unfamiliar forest grounds. All's well until the group members start getting killed by a cunning killer in the woods.

Title: 157. Project A
description: Fighting against pirates at the turn of the 20th century, the Hong Kong navy are failing miserably. It's up to Sergeant Dragon Ma to take matters into his own hands.

Title: 158. Surf II
description: A disgruntled nerd, who was bullied in high school, creates Buzz Cola, a soft drink that turns surfers into mindless zombies.

Title: 159. Cecilia
description: A woman experiences a traumatic sexual assault. Despite her ordeal, she reconnects intimately with her husband. She subsequently explore various consensual sexual relationships while processing the emotional impact of the initial incident.

Title: 160. Hundra
description: Born in a tribe of fierce warrior women, the archer and sword fighter, Hundra, has been raised to despise the influence of men. Superior to any male, Hundra takes a vow of revenge until one day she finds love.

Title: 161. Mausoleum
description: 10-year-old Susan Walker, mourning her mother's death, is possessed by a demon who has been preying on her female ancestors for centuries. Years later, the demon takes over when she has married OIiver Farrell and entered psychoanalysis.

Title: 162. The 4th Man
description: A man who has been having visions of an impending danger begins an affair with a woman who may lead him to his doom.

Title: 163. Conquest
description: A young man, armed with a magical bow and arrows, embarks on a mystical journey through a mystical land to rid it of all evil and joins forces with an outlaw to take down an evil witch bent on claiming the magic bow for evil.
